name: Opilau Ubenhau
description:
A hurricane has scattered the instruments of Opilau Island! Find the lost citizens and help them recover their beloved drums, kazoo and xylophone so music can return to the island!

This is  a short game created for Global Game Jam 2019 at the Albany, NY location. The theme for this jam was 'What home means to you'. To me - home is about friends, family, and helping out each other which is what I focused on for the game design.

Developed and modeled by Ian Stead using UE4 4.21.2 and Houdini.

Music and Sound credits:

Background song 'Midnight Bell' from purple-planet.com. Song loops created with Google Song Maker. Kazoo sound from freesound.org.

  • Instrument loops created with: Google Song Maker
  • Music: https://www.purple-planet.com
  • Kazoo sound effect: https://freesound.org/people/wheathan/sounds/48237/
